project.title: PixelSprite
project.description: !format **PixelSprite** is a work-in-progress Unity package which aims to bridge the gap between modern rendering techniques and low-resolution stylized graphics. The main function of the plugin is to take 3D meshes, vector art, particle systems, or any other renderable object= in Unity and transform it into pixel art dynamically in real time.
project.feature: Realtime dynamic pixelization of any renderable object in Unity
Stylization options including outlines and palette swapping
Control over how pixelated graphics are drawn to the screen
Additional 2D tools including bendable objects and vertex snapping
